entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
